item.title: Daily Life
item.description: BOARDING HOUSE SCHEDULE SUMMER (MONDAY TO FRIDAY) 05:00am Rouse Bell 05:15am to 06:00am Morning Exercise 06:00am to 07:00am Bath & Change 07:00am to 01:20pm School Schedule 07:55am to 08:25amBreak Fast 01:20pm to 01:50pm Lunch 01:50pm to 02:30pm Rest Time 02:30pm to 04:15pm Self Study 04:15pm to 05:15pm Games 05:15pm to 05:45pm Wash & Change 05:45pm to 06:15pm Snacks 06:15pm to 08:00pm Study Time 08:00pm to 08:30pm Dinner 08:30pm to 09:30pmT.

item.title: Life @ Madhusthali
item.description: CULTURE Madhusthali makes sure that the students get enriched with Indian culture. For this we have weekly hobby classes. These classes are specially allotted for the students, are crafted in a manner that the students get informed about Indian as well as western forms of art and culture. From painting to literature to cultural values, students are taught everything from India as well as the world over. This helps them to increase their knowledge about the world and the country they live in.
